column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Wow! This is THE PLACE for the best tasting Chicago style deep-dish pizza. Add a Malnati's salad to the order and you will not regret one bite.  Large deep dish is huge! 2 big eaters could only finish 1/2 a pie. But oh so delicious. Beats UNO's hands down.  Malnati's is where authentic deep-dish is done best. And
column3: friendly hotel delivery as well.  Try Malnati's today!! I'm glad I did!
